title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 813.9 - Waiver of provision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 813.9 - Waiver of provision

State Regulations

Upon written request by the applicant, the commissioner may
waive any provisions of this Part not otherwise required by law, by giving
prior written approval, after full disclosure of all relevant facts and
circumstances and a determination by the commissioner that the subject
provision imposes an unreasonable burden on the applicant, and that the
proposed alternative transaction is necessary for project
advancement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14

813.9

Adopted

New

York State Register May 17, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 20, eff. 5/17/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
